heading: HB00109
0: AN ACT INTEGRATING ALL AGENCIES AND OFFICES ON VETERANS WELFARE, CREATING FOR THE PURPOSE THE PHILIPPINE VETERANS AUTHORITY (PVA), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
status: Pending with the Committee on GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION since 2016-07-26
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00109
FULL TITLE : AN ACT INTEGRATING ALL AGENCIES AND OFFICES ON VETERANS WELFARE, CREATING FOR THE PURPOSE THE PHILIPPINE VETERANS AUTHORITY (PVA), APPROPRIATING FUNDS THEREFOR, AND FOR OTHER PURPOSES
SHORT TITLE : Philippine Veterans Authority Act
ABSTRACT : Harmonizes all efforts in generating and maximizing financial sources and facilities and support all veterans welfare programs designed to alleviate the [plights of the veterans.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : ALEJANO, GARY C.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Reform
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Bataoil (007 2016-08-08)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON GOVERNMENT REORGANIZATION ON 2016-07-26
SECONDARILY REFERRED TO THE COMMITTEE(S) ON VETERANS AFFAIRS AND WELFARE
